channel.title: How to make monster drops?! STILL NEED HELP!
channel.description:
Yup, this question has frustrated me to death. I want to make monster drops (when they die) but how? So confused it isnt funny...please be very specific :P
...Thanks in advance.

item.title: How to make monster drops?! STILL NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Man_Hunter Dead Man Hunter
item.description:
@Dead_Man_Hunter wrote:

[code]public static int abyssal[] = {1249,4151,4151,4151,1247,985,987,1149,1149,2366,1615,2366,1148,1113,1319,1201,1373,2363,1185,1365,1623};

public static int randomAbyssal()
{
	return abyssal[(int)(Math.random()*abyssal.length)];
}[/code]

That would be abbysal demons…You must add to Item2 the file.
